name: Albania
startIntroPart1: Hail to you, o great hetman Ivan Sirko. Ukraine is one of the successors of the medieval realm of Kyivan Rus. As such, Ukraine has a claim to the lands of the Rus alongside Russia. This has brought Ukraine and Russia conflict against each other on who leads Kyiv. Ukraine is led by Ivan Sirko and his Cossack hosts.
startIntroPart2: Lord Hetman, the Cossacks look to you to lead them into freedom and greatness. Will you wrest the Rus away from the Muscovite pretenders? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your lands will soon be mine, prepare for war!
attacked: Have you declared war on us? This was a huge mistake on your part, prepare to be destroyed!
defeated: You have destroyed our once great civilization. History will not look kindly upon you.
introduction: Greetings, stranger! I am Ivan Sirko, Ataman of Zaporizhian Cossacks. Gaze in awe on the majesty that is our great civilization!
hateHello: You again! What did you want?
tradeRequest: Well, how is my proposal to you?
uniques: Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills
